intro.title: Welcome!
intro.paragraph: This Pokémon search project allows you to find a Pokémon by name, number, type, or ability. The data is loaded from a JSON file on the server and displayed dynamically on the homepage.

overview.title: Project Overview
overview.description: PokéArena is a full-stack web application that allows users to search for Pokémon, view their stats, mark favorites, and battle against other players or a bot. The platform integrates the Pokémon API and offers interactive features with secure user management and data storage.
features: Registration & login with secure session management
Search and view detailed Pokémon stats
Battle system: vs Bot and vs other Players
Embedded YouTube videos for each Pokémon
